title: Radio Replay: Watch Your Mouth
description: If you're bilingual or multilingual, you may have noticed that different languages make you stretch in different ways. In this month's Radio Replay, we ask whether the structure of the languages we speak can change the way we see the world. We'll also look at how languages evolve, and why we're sometimes resistant to those changes.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
